data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Occupational therapists use their knowledge, skills, and experience to help patients return to the roles and activities in their home and community that were interrupted by health complications. This ____ involves ____ individuals ____ their ____ environment ____ special ____ to ____ them ____ return ____ work ____ engage ____ other ____. Occupational ____ evaluate ____ individual's environment ____ recommend ____ that ____ improve ____ quality ____ life ____ home ____ in ____ community. Occupational therapists also recommend ways patients can continue their usual daily activities, such as performing household chores, cooking, or caring for children.

Occupational therapists also recommend ways patients can continue their usual daily activities, such as performing household chores, cooking, or caring for children.
data.answer: 职业治疗师利用他们的知识、技能和经验，帮助患者恢复家庭和社区中因健康并发症而中断的角色和活动。这通常包括帮助个人修改家庭环境和特殊设备，使他们能够重返工作岗位或从事其他活动。职业治疗师评估个人的环境，并建议改变，以提高他们在家庭或社区的生活质量。职业治疗师还会推荐一些方法，让患者能够继续进行日常活动，比如做家务、做饭或照顾孩子。
